name: The Fantastic Fox Run
description:
This is my first game on Unreal Engine. Yes is an 2D game on Unreal Engine but... why not? 

Is an infinite runner when you play a fox against ennemies. You will have to jump and slide to defeat them. 

This is a small game, but I wanted to start with a not too ambitious game.

Thanks for your playing and i hope see your opinion on my game. 

Credit :
